about_the_game:
Color Lim is a platformer adventure game about the journey of a little Slime named Lim, who sets out to find their own color in a world where color determines everything. In a world where ruined cities and nature intertwine, Lim absorbs various colors and carves out a new path. Will Lim ever find their true color?

[Awakening the Power of Color]

Without a color of their own, Lim absorbs and transforms the colors around them, turning them into powerful tools. Plan your strategy as you interact with enemies that change based on color, and fill each moment with new challenges and opportunities. Experience the endless possibilities shaped by your choices.

[Diverse Paths, Unique Stories]

Abandoned cities, vine-covered streets, and hidden mysteries await. Lim faces various environments and chooses countless paths, overcoming challenges and opening new possibilities. Explore this vibrant world of color with Lim! Which path will you choose?

[Where Reality Meets Fantasy]

Once a thriving civilization, now a place where nature has taken over. In this world, both familiar and strange, Lim rescues the isolated and rebuilds a village. The village grows and changes with each new arrival, as small hopes blossom anew. What secrets will you uncover in this place?

short_description: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, Color Lim follows Lim, a colorless slime on a quest to find his true color. Change colors to navigate, transform into enemies to use their abilities, and solve puzzles to shape Lim's unique journey.
